message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $13500. I think this is a great price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13000. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I think it's a good compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm really interested in the product, and I think we can work something out.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go below $12500. I'm willing to make one more concession, though. I'll sell the product to you for $12750. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $12500, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. I'm really hoping we can come to an agreement at this price.
